titles.title: Theodore Roosevelt-Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge Act of 2003
A bill to redesignate the Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge in the State of Louisiana as the "Theodore Roosevelt-Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge".
Theodore Roosevelt-Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Theodore Roosevelt-Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge Act of 2003 - Designates the Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge in Tensas, Franklin, and Madison Parishes, Louisiana, as the Theodore Roosevelt-Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge.
